activities: We are a debt collection agency specializing in the recovery of long overdue materials and fines for public libraries.  This safe harbor certification also covers Unique International Recoveries and Unique National Collections which are part of Unique Managment Services.
recoursemech: compliance with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution and/or commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
